DOC.brief_summary: This study will explore the safety and efficacy of AGN201781 in patients with postherpetic neuralgia or post-traumatic peripheral neuralgia
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of AGN201781 in Neuropathic Pain
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of postherpetic neuralgia or posttraumatic peripheral neuralgia Moderate or severe pain associated with postherpetic neuralgia or posttraumatic peripheral neuralgia Women of childbearing potential Any other uncontrolled diseases
